metadata.title: CVE-2024-50168 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/sun3_82586: fix potential memory leak in sun3_82586_send_packet()The sun3_82586_send_packet() returns NETDEV_TX_OK without freeing skbin case of skb->len being too long, add dev_kfree_skb() to fix it.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
